data.actual_result: It spams submissions of the code and can rapidly get you rate limited
data.expected_result: It should erase all characters before the last one
data.short_description: If you hold the backspace key when cursor is before the last character in XBox auth code, the app will spam submissions of the code
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to account settings >  Connections - Add > XBox - Enter an invalid code - Place your cursor behind the last character - Hold the backspace key
